biologicalSex._instruction: Add the biological sex of this specimen.

internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier of this specimen that is used within the corresponding data.

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this specimen that may help you to more easily find it again.

phenotype._instruction: Add the phenotype of this specimen.

species._instruction: Add the species or the strain (a sub-type of a genetic variant of species) of this specimen.
